hadith1.title: عند الاستيقاظ | Upon Waking
hadith1.summary: Beautiful supplication taught by Imam Zayn al-Abidin for beginning each day

steps.arabic: قَالَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ
steps.translation: Abu Abdullah (Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him) said:

steps.arabic: إِنَّ عَلِيَّ بْنَ اَلْحُسَيْنِ صَلَوَاتُ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ
steps.translation: "Verily, Ali ibn al-Husayn (prayers of Allah be upon him)
when morning came, would say:
'I begin this day
in the face of my forgetfulness and haste,

steps.arabic: بِسْمِ اَللَّهِ وَ مَا شَاءَ اَللَّهُ
steps.transliteration: Bismi llāhi wa mā shā'a llāh
steps.translation: [with] "In the name of Allah, and what Allah wills."
If a servant does this,
it suffices him for what he forgets during his day.'"

hadith2.title: دعاء الصباح | Morning Supplication
hadith2.summary: Powerful protection prayer taught by Imam Zayn al-Abidin for seeking divine shelter

steps.arabic: عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلَامُ قَالَ
steps.transliteration: ʿAn Abī ʿAbdillāhi ʿalayhi s-salāmu qāl
steps.translation: From Abu Abdullah (Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him), who said:

steps.arabic: كَانَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ اَلْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِمَا اَلسَّلاَمُ يَقُولُ
steps.transliteration: Kāna ʿAliyyu bnu l-Ḥusayni ʿalayhimā s-salāmu yaqūl
steps.translation: "Ali ibn al-Husayn (peace be upon them both) used to say:

steps.arabic: مَا أُبَالِي إِذَا قُلْتُ هَذِهِ اَلْكَلِمَاتِ
steps.transliteration: Mā ubālī idhā qultu hādhihi l-kalimāt
steps.translation: 'I care not, when I utter these words,

steps.arabic: لَوِ اِجْتَمَعَ عَلَيَّ اَلْإِنْسُ وَ اَلْجِنُّ
steps.transliteration: Lawi jtamaʿa ʿalayya l-insu wa l-jinn
steps.translation: even if all humans and jinn were to gather against me:
"In the name of Allah, and by Allah,

steps.transliteration: Wa mina llāhi wa ilā llāh
steps.translation: and from Allah, and to Allah,
and in the path of Allah,
and upon the creed of the Messenger of Allah,
may Allah bless him and his family.
O Allah, to You I submit myself,
to You I turn my face,
to You I entrust my back,
and to You I surrender my affairs.
O Allah, protect me with the protection of faith

steps.arabic: مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ وَ مِنْ خَلْفِي
steps.transliteration: Min bayni yadayya wa min khalfī
steps.translation: from before me and behind me,

steps.transliteration: Wa ʿan yamīnī wa ʿan shimālī
steps.translation: from my right and my left,

steps.transliteration: Wa min fawqī wa min taḥtī
steps.translation: from above me and below me,
and from my front.

steps.arabic: وَ اِدْفَعْ عَنِّي بِحَوْلِكَ وَ قُوَّتِكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa dfaʿ ʿannī bi-ḥawlika wa quwwatik
steps.translation: And repel [harm] from me by Your power and strength,

steps.arabic: فَإِنَّهُ لاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِكَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-innahu lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā bik"'"
steps.translation: for there is no power nor strength except through You."'"

hadith3.title: عند الاستيقاظ | Morning Fragrance
hadith3.summary: On the spiritual benefits of applying fragrance at the beginning of the day

steps.arabic: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ رَفَعَهُ إِلَى أَبِي عَبْدِ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ قَالَ
steps.transliteration: ʿAliyyu bnu Ibrāhīma rafaʿahu ilā Abī ʿAbdillāhi ʿalayhi s-salāmu qāl
steps.translation: Ali ibn Ibrahim raised it (in narration) to Abu Abdullah (al-Sadiq, peace be upon him), who said:
"Whoever applies fragrance at the beginning of the day,

steps.arabic: لَمْ يَزَلْ عَقْلُهُ مَعَهُ إِلَى اَللَّيْلِ
steps.transliteration: Lam yazal ʿaqluhu maʿahu ilā l-layl"
steps.translation: his intellect will remain with him until night."

steps.arabic: وَ قَالَ قَالَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ
steps.transliteration: Wa qāla qāla Abū ʿAbdillāhi ʿalayhi s-salām
steps.translation: And he (the Imam) said:
"The prayer of one who uses fragrance is superior
to seventy prayers without fragrance."

hadith1.title: وضوء | Imam Ali's Comprehensive Wudhu Supplication
hadith1.summary: Detailed narration of Imam Ali's wudhu practice with spiritual supplications for each step

steps.arabic: عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ قَالَ:
steps.transliteration: ʿAn Abī ʿAbdillāhi ʿalayhi s-salāmu qāl:
steps.translation: From Abu Abdullah (Imam al-Sadiq), peace be upon him, who said:

steps.arabic: بَيْنَا أَمِيرُ اَلْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ ذَاتَ يَوْمٍ جَالِساً مَعَ اِبْنِ اَلْحَنَفِيَّةِ إِذْ قَالَ يَا مُحَمَّدُ اِئْتِنِي بِإِنَاءٍ فِيهِ مَاءٌ أَتَوَضَّأْ لِلصَّلاَةِ
steps.transliteration: Baynā Amīru l-Muʾminīna ʿalayhi s-salāmu dhāta yawmin jālisan maʿa ibni l-Ḥanafiyyati idh qāla yā Muḥammadu iʾtinī bi-ināʾin fīhi māʾun atawaḍḍaʾu li-ṣ-ṣalāh
steps.translation: One day, the Commander of the Faithful (Imam Ali), peace be upon him, was sitting with Ibn al-Hanafiyyah when he said, "O Muhammad, bring me a vessel with water so I may perform ablution for prayer."

steps.arabic: فَأَتَاهُ مُحَمَّدٌ بِالْمَاءِ فَأَكْفَأَ بِيَدِهِ اَلْيُمْنَى عَلَى يَدِهِ اَلْيُسْرَى
steps.transliteration: Fa-atāhu Muḥammadun bi-l-māʾi fa-akfaʾa bi-yadihi l-yumnā ʿalā yadihi l-yusrā
steps.translation: Muhammad brought him the water. He poured water with his right hand onto his left hand,

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ قَالَ بِسْمِ اَللَّهِ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ اَلَّذِي جَعَلَ اَلْمَاءَ طَهُوراً وَ لَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ نَجِساً
steps.transliteration: Thumma qāla bi-smi llāhi l-ḥamdu li-llāhi l-ladhī jaʿala l-māʾa ṭahūran wa lam yajʿalhu najisā
steps.translation: Then he said: "In the name of Allah. Praise be to Allah, who made water purifying and not impure."
Then he cleansed himself (after relieving himself),

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ حَصِّنْ فَرْجِي وَ أَعِفَّهُ وَ اُسْتُرْ عَوْرَتِي وَ حَرِّمْنِي عَلَى اَلنَّارِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma ḥaṣṣin farjī wa aʿiffahu wa ustur ʿawratī wa ḥarrimnī ʿalā n-nār
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, safeguard my chastity, keep me pure, conceal my faults, and forbid me from the Fire."
He then rinsed his mouth,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ لَقِّنِّي حُجَّتِي يَوْمَ أَلْقَاكَ وَ أَطْلِقْ لِسَانِي بِذِكْرِكَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma laqqinnī ḥujjatī yawma alqāka wa aṭliq lisānī bi-dhikrika
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, grant me my argument on the day I meet You, and let my tongue flow with Your remembrance."
He then inhaled water into his nostrils,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ تُحَرِّمْ عَلَيَّ رِيحَ اَلْجَنَّةِ وَ اِجْعَلْنِي مِمَّنْ يَشَمُّ رِيحَهَا وَ رَوْحَهَا وَ رَيْحَانَهَا وَ طِيبَهَا
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma lā tuḥarrim ʿalayya rīḥa l-jannati wa ijʿalnī mimman yashammu rīḥahā wa rawḥahā wa rayḥānahā wa ṭībahā
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, do not deprive me of the fragrance of Paradise, and make me among those who inhale its fragrance, bliss, flowers, and sweetness."
Then he washed his face,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ بَيِّضْ وَجْهِي يَوْمَ تَسْوَدُّ فِيهِ اَلْوُجُوهُ وَ لاَ تُسَوِّدْ وَجْهِي يَوْمَ تَبْيَضُّ فِيهِ اَلْوُجُوهُ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma bayyiḍ wajhī yawma taswaddu fīhi l-wujūhu wa lā tusawwid wajhī yawma tabyaḍḍu fīhi l-wujūh
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, brighten my face on the day when faces turn black, and do not darken my face on the day when faces turn white."
Then he washed his right hand,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِنِي كِتَابِي بِيَمِينِي وَ اَلْخُلْدَ فِي اَلْجِنَانِ بِيَسَارِي وَ حَاسِبْنِي حِسٰاباً يَسِيراً
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma aʿṭinī kitābī bi-yamīnī wa l-khulda fī l-jināni bi-yasārī wa ḥāsibnī ḥisāban yasīrā
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, grant me my record in my right hand, eternal life in Paradise in my left, and judge me with an easy reckoning."
Then he washed his left hand,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ تُعْطِنِي كِتَابِي بِشِمَالِي وَ لاَ تَجْعَلْهَا مَغْلُولَةً إِلَى عُنُقِي وَ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ مُقَطَّعَاتِ اَلنِّيرَانِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma lā tuʿṭinī kitābī bi-shimālī wa lā tajʿalhā maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqī wa aʿūdhu bika min muqaṭṭaʿāti n-nīrān
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, do not give me my record in my left hand, nor bind it to my neck, and I seek refuge in You from the flames of Hellfire."
Then he wiped his head,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ غَشِّنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ وَ بَرَكَاتِكَ وَ عَفْوِكَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma ghashshinī bi-raḥmatika wa barakātika wa ʿafwik
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, envelop me in Your mercy, blessings, and forgiveness."
Then he wiped his feet,

steps.arabic: فَقَالَ اَللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِي عَلَى اَلصِّرَاطِ يَوْمَ تَزِلُّ فِيهِ اَلْأَقْدَامُ وَ اِجْعَلْ سَعْيِي فِيمَا يُرْضِيكَ عَنِّي يَا أَرْحَمَ اَلرَّاحِمِينَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-qāla llāhumma thabbitnī ʿalā ṣ-ṣirāṭi yawma tazillu fīhi l-aqdāmu wa ijʿal saʿyī fīmā yurḍīka ʿannī yā arḥama r-rāḥimīn
steps.translation: And said: "O Allah, keep me steadfast on the Bridge (Sirat) on the day when feet slip, and let my efforts be in what pleases You, O Most Merciful of the Merciful."

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ فَنَظَرَ إِلَى مُحَمَّدٍ فَقَالَ يَا مُحَمَّدُ مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ مِثْلَ وُضُوئِي وَ قَالَ مِثْلَ قَوْلِي خَلَقَ اَللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ مِنْ كُلِّ قَطْرَةٍ مَلَكاً يُقَدِّسُهُ وَ يُسَبِّحُهُ وَ يُكَبِّرُهُ وَ يَكْتُبُ اَللَّهُ تَعَالَى لَهُ ثَوَابَ ذَلِكَ إِلَى يَوْمِ اَلْقِيَامَةِ
steps.transliteration: Thumma rafaʿa raʾsahu fa-naẓara ilā Muḥammadin fa-qāla yā Muḥammadu man tawaḍḍaʾa mithla wuḍūʾī wa qāla mithla qawlī khalaqa llāhu ʿazza wa jalla min kulli qaṭratin malakan yuqaddisuhu wa yusabbiḥuhu wa yukabbiruhu wa yaktubu llāhu taʿālā lahu thawāba dhālika ilā yawmi l-qiyāmah
steps.translation: Then he raised his head and looked at Muhammad and said, "O Muhammad, whoever performs ablution like mine and recites these words like I did, Allah the Almighty will create from every drop [of water] an angel who glorifies, praises, and exalts Him, and Allah will record its reward for him until the Day of Resurrection."

supplication1.title: الدعاء بالتوبة | Supplication on Confession
supplication1.summary: Heartfelt prayer acknowledging human imperfection and seeking divine mercy

steps.translation: And among his prayers (upon him be peace)

steps.arabic: فِي الِاعْتِرَافِ وَطَلَبِ التَّوْبَةِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى
steps.transliteration: Fī l-i'tirāfi wa-ṭalabi t-tawbati ilā llāhi ta'ālā
steps.translation: in confession and seeking repentance from Allah, the Exalted:

steps.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ يَحْجُبُنِي عَنْ مَسْأَلَتِكَ خِلَالٌ ثَلَاثٌ، وَتَحْدُونِي عَلَيْهَا خَلَّةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma innahu yaḥjubunī 'an mas'alatika khilālun thalāth, wa-taḥdūnī 'alayhā khallatun wāḥidah
steps.translation: O Allah, three traits prevent me from asking You, yet one trait compels me:

steps.arabic: يَحْجُبُنِي أَمْرٌ أَمَرْتَ بِهِ فَأَبْطَأْتُ عَنْهُ
steps.translation: What prevents me is a command You ordered, but I delayed in obeying;
a prohibition You forbade, but I hastened toward it;

steps.arabic: وَنِعْمَةٌ أَنْعَمْتَ بِهَا عَلَيَّ فَقَصَّرْتُ فِي شُكْرِهَا
steps.transliteration: Wa-ni'matun an'amta bihā 'alayya fa-qaṣṣartu fī shukrihā
steps.translation: and a blessing You bestowed, but I fell short in gratitude.

steps.arabic: وَيَحْدُونِي عَلَى مَسْأَلَتِكَ تَفَضُّلُكَ عَلَى مَنْ أَقْبَلَ بِوَجْهِهِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa-yaḥdūnī 'alā mas'alatika tafaḍḍuluka 'alā man aqbala bi-wajhihi ilayka
steps.translation: What compels me is Your grace toward those who turn to You
and approach You with good hope.
For all Your benevolence is grace,
and all Your favors are initiated by You alone.

steps.arabic: فَهَا أَنَا ذَا، يَا إِلَهِي وَاقِفٌ بِبَابِ عِزِّكَ وُقُوفَ المُسْتَسْلِمِ الذَّلِيلِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-hā anā dhā, yā ilāhī wāqifun bi-bābi 'izzika wuqūfa l-mustaslimi dh-dhalīl
steps.translation: Here I stand, my God, at the door of Your might--humbled and surrendered--

steps.arabic: وَسَائِلُكَ عَلَى الحَيَاءِ مِنِّي سُؤَالَ البَائِسِ المُعِيلِ
steps.transliteration: Wa-sā'iluka 'alā l-ḥayā'i minnī su'āla l-bā'isi l-mu'īl
steps.translation: asking You despite my shame, like a destitute beggar.

dua_iftitah.title: دعاء الافتتاح | Dua Iftitah
dua_iftitah.summary: Beautiful opening supplication commonly recited during the nights of Ramadan

steps.translation: O Allah, I begin praise with Your praise.
And You guide to correctness by Your grace.

steps.transliteration: Wa ayqantu annaka anta arḥamu r-rāḥimīn
steps.translation: I am certain that You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
In the place of forgiveness and mercy,
You are the Most Severe in punishment
in the place of retribution and wrath.
You are the Greatest of sovereigns
in the place of majesty and grandeur.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَذِنْتَ لِي فِي دُعَائِكَ وَمَسْأَلَتِكَ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma adhinta lī fī du'ā'ika wa mas'alatik
steps.translation: O Allah, You have permitted me to supplicate and ask of You,
so hear, O All-Hearing, my praise,
answer, O Merciful, my call,
and pardon, O Forgiver, my misstep.

steps.arabic: فَكَمْ يَا إِلٰهِي مِنْ كُرْبَةٍ قَدْ فَرَّجْتَهَا
steps.transliteration: Fakam yā ilāhī min kurbatin qad farrajtahā
steps.translation: For how many distresses, my Lord, have You relieved?
How many sorrows have You dispelled?
How many stumbles have You pardoned?
How many mercies have You spread?
How many cycles of affliction have You broken?

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ صَاحِبَةً وَلاَ وَلَداً
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī lam yattakhidh ṣāḥibatan wa lā waladā
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, who has no spouse nor offspring,

steps.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ شَرِيكٌ فِي ٱلْمُلْكِ
steps.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu sharīkun fī l-mulk
steps.translation: no partner in dominion,

steps.arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ وَلِيٌّ مِنَ ٱلذُّلِّ
steps.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu waliyyun mina dh-dhull
steps.translation: and no ally from weakness.
Magnify Him with greatness!
Praise be to Allah with all praises in entirety,
for all His blessings in totality.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ مُضَادَّ لَهُ فِي مُلْكِهِ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī lā muḍādda lahu fī mulkih
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, who has no rival in His kingdom,

steps.transliteration: Wa lā munāziʿa lahu fī amrih
steps.translation: no contender in His command,

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ فِي خَلْقِهِ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī lā sharīka lahu fī khalqih
steps.translation: no partner in His creation,

steps.transliteration: Wa lā shabīha lahu fī ʿaẓamatih
steps.translation: and no equal in His majesty.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْفَاشِي فِي ٱلْخَلْقِ أَمْرُهُ وَحَمْدُهُ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-fāshī fī l-khalqi amruhu wa ḥamduh
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, whose command and praise pervade creation,
Whose majesty is manifest through generosity,
Who extends His hand with bounty,
Whose treasuries never diminish,

steps.arabic: وَلاَ تَزِيدُهُ كَثْرَةُ ٱلْعَطَاءِ إِلاَّ جُوداً وَكَرَماً
steps.transliteration: Wa lā tazīduhu kathratu l-ʿaṭā'i illā jūdan wa karamā
steps.translation: and whose abundant giving only increases Him in generosity and honor.
Truly, He is the All-Mighty, the Bestower.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ قَلِيلاً مِنْ كَثِيرٍ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma innī as'aluka qalīlan min kathīr
steps.translation: O Allah, I ask You for a small portion of Your abundant blessings,
though my need for it is immense,
while Your independence from it is eternal.
What I seek is vast to me,
yet it is simple and easy for You.
O Allah, Your forgiveness of my sins,
Your overlooking of my errors,
Your pardon for my wrongs,
Your concealment of my shameful deeds,
and Your forbearance toward my frequent offenses—

steps.arabic: عِنْدَ مَا كَانَ مِنْ خَطَإِي وَعَمْدِي
steps.transliteration: ʿInda mā kāna min khaṭa'ī wa ʿamdī
steps.translation: despite my mistakes and deliberate transgressions—

steps.arabic: أَطْمَعَنِي فِي أَنْ أَسْأَلَكَ مَا لاَ أَسْتَوْجِبُهُ مِنْكَ
steps.transliteration: Aṭmaʿanī fī an as'alaka mā lā astawjibuhu mink
steps.translation: have emboldened me to ask what I do not deserve from You.
For You have sustained me through Your mercy,
shown me glimpses of Your power,
and acquainted me with Your responsiveness.
Thus, I call upon You with confidence,
and ask You with familiarity,
neither fearful nor hesitant,

steps.arabic: مُدِلاًّ عَلَيْكَ فِيمَا قَصَدْتُ فِيهِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.transliteration: Mudillan ʿalayka fīmā qaṣadtu fīhi ilayk
steps.translation: relying on You in all I seek from You.

steps.arabic: فَإِنْ أَبْطَأَ عَنِّي عَتَبْتُ بِجَهْلِي عَلَيْكَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-in abṭa'a ʿannī ʿatabtu bi-jahlī ʿalayk
steps.translation: Yet if Your response is delayed, I complain foolishly,

steps.arabic: وَلَعَلَّ ٱلَّذِي أَبْطَأَ عَنِّي هُوَ خَيْرٌ لِي
steps.transliteration: Wa laʿalla l-ladhī abṭa'a ʿannī huwa khayrun lī
steps.translation: though perhaps what is delayed is better for me,
for You know the outcomes of all matters.
I have never seen a generous Lord

steps.arabic: أَصْبَرَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدٍ لَئِيمٍ مِنْكَ عَلَيَّ
steps.transliteration: Aṣbara ʿalā ʿabdin la'īmin minka ʿalayya
steps.translation: more patient with a wretched servant than You are with me.

steps.arabic: يَا رَبِّ إِنَّكَ تَدْعُونِي فَأُوَلِّي عَنْكَ
steps.transliteration: Yā rabbi innaka tadʿūnī fa-uwallī ʿank
steps.translation: O Lord, You call me, yet I turn away;
You show me affection, yet I respond with aversion.

steps.transliteration: Wa tatawaddadu ilayya fa-lā aqbalu mink
steps.translation: You extend kindness, yet I refuse to accept it.
As though I hold superiority over You—

steps.arabic: فَلَمْ يَمْنَعْكَ ذٰلِكَ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَةِ لِي
steps.transliteration: Fa-lam yamnaʿka dhālika mina r-raḥmati lī
steps.translation: yet this does not deter You from showing me mercy,
kindness,

steps.transliteration: Wa t-tafaḍḍuli ʿalayya bi-jūdika wa karamik
steps.translation: and grace through Your generosity and magnanimity.
So have mercy on Your ignorant servant,
and bestow upon him the bounty of Your benevolence.
Truly, You are the Generous, the Benevolent.
Praise be to Allah, Owner of Sovereignty,
Director of ships,
Subduer of the winds,
Splitter of the dawn,
Judge of the Final Reckoning,
Lord of all worlds.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ حِلْمِهِ بَعْدَ عِلْمِهِ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi ʿalā ḥilmihi baʿda ʿilmih
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah for His forbearance despite His knowledge,

steps.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ عَفْوِهِ بَعْدَ قُدْرَتِهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa l-ḥamdu lillāhi ʿalā ʿafwihi baʿda qudratih
steps.translation: for His pardon despite His power,

steps.arabic: وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ عَلَىٰ طُولِ أَنَاتِهِ فِي غَضَبِهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa l-ḥamdu lillāhi ʿalā ṭūli anātihi fī ghaḍabih
steps.translation: for His enduring patience even in His wrath,

steps.transliteration: Wa huwa qādirun ʿalā mā yurīd
steps.translation: though He is capable of all He wills.
Praise be to Allah, Creator of creation,
Expander of provision,
Splitter of the dawn,
Possessor of Majesty and Honor,
of Grace and Favors,
Who is so vast He cannot be seen,
yet so near He witnesses the whispers.
Blessed and Exalted is He!

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَيْسَ لَهُ مُنَازِعٌ يُعَادِلُهُ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī laysa lahu munāziʿun yuʿādiluh
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, who has no rival to equal Him,
no likeness to resemble Him,
no supporter to aid Him.
By His might, He subdues the mighty,
and before His grandeur, the great humble themselves.

steps.arabic: فَكَمْ مِنْ مَوْهِبَةٍ هَنِيئَةٍ قَدْ أَعْطَانِي
steps.transliteration: Fa-kam min mawhibatin hanī'atin qad aʿṭānī
steps.translation: How many delightful gifts have You granted me,
and great, fearsome burdens have You spared me?
How many joys of splendor have You shown me?
Thus, I praise You gratefully,
and remember You in glorification.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ يُهْتَكُ حِجَابُهُ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī lā yuhtaku ḥijābuh
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, whose veil is never torn,
whose door is never closed,
whose seeker is never turned away,
and whose hopeful is never disappointed.
Praise be to Allah, who gives security to the fearful,
delivers the righteous,
exalts the oppressed,
humbles the arrogant,

steps.transliteration: Wa yuhliku mulūkan wa yastakhlifu ākharīn
steps.translation: destroys kings and replaces them with others.
Praise be to Allah, the Crusher of tyrants,
the Destroyer of oppressors,
the Reacher of fugitives,
the Punisher of wrongdoers,
the Responder to the distressed,
the Fulfiller of seekers' needs,
the Reliance of the faithful.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي مِنْ خَشْيَتِهِ تَرْعُدُ ٱلسَّمَاءُ وَسُكَّانُهَا
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī min khashyatihi tarʿudu s-samā'u wa sukkānuhā
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, at whose fear the heavens and their inhabitants tremble,
the earth and its dwellers quake,

steps.arabic: وَتَمُوجُ ٱلْبِحَارُ وَمَنْ يَسْبَحُ فِي غَمَرَاتِهَا
steps.transliteration: Wa tamūju l-biḥāru wa man yasbaḥu fī ghamarātihā
steps.translation: and the seas and all who swim in their depths surge.
Praise be to Allah, who guided us to this,

steps.arabic: وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلاَ أَنْ هَدَانَا ٱللَّهُ
steps.transliteration: Wa mā kunnā li-nahtadiya lawlā an hadānā llāh
steps.translation: for we would never have attained guidance without His guidance.

steps.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يَخْلُقُ وَلَمْ يُخْلَقْ
steps.transliteration: Al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī yakhluqu wa lam yukhlaq
steps.translation: Praise be to Allah, who creates but is not created,
provides but is not provided for,
feeds but is not fed,
He causes the living to die.
And revives the dead.
He is Ever-Living, never dying.
In His hand is all good,

steps.transliteration: Wa huwa ʿalā kulli shay'in qadīr
steps.translation: and He is over all things All-Powerful.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ وَرَسُولِكَ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma ṣalli ʿalā Muḥammadin ʿabdika wa rasūlik
steps.translation: O Allah, bless Muhammad, Your servant and Messenger,

steps.transliteration: Wa amīnika wa ṣafiyyika wa ḥabībik
steps.translation: Your trusted one, Your pure one, Your beloved,
Your chosen one from creation,
the guardian of Your secrets,
the conveyor of Your messages.
Bestow upon him the finest, most beautiful,

steps.transliteration: Wa akmala wa azkā wa anmā
steps.translation: most complete, purest, and most abundant

steps.transliteration: Wa aṭyaba wa aṭhara wa asnā
steps.translation: most excellent, most sacred, and most exalted

steps.transliteration: Wa akthara mā ṣallayta wa bārakta
steps.translation: and the greatest blessings, benedictions,
mercy, tenderness,

steps.arabic: وَسَلَّمْتَ عَلَىٰ أَحَدٍ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ وَأَنْبِيَائِكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa sallamta ʿalā aḥadin min ʿibādika wa anbiyā'ik
steps.translation: and salutations You have bestowed upon any of Your servants, prophets,
messengers, or chosen ones,

steps.transliteration: Wa ahli l-karāmati ʿalayka min khalqik
steps.translation: or those honored by You among creation.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ وَصَلِّ عَلَىٰ عَلِيٍّ أَمِيرِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma wa ṣalli ʿalā ʿAliyyin amīri l-mu'minīn
steps.translation: O Allah, bless Ali, the Commander of the Faithful,
the successor of the Messenger of the Lord of the Worlds,

steps.transliteration: ʿAbdika wa waliyyika wa akhī rasūlik
steps.translation: Your servant, Your guardian, and the brother of Your Messenger,
Your proof over creation,
Your greatest sign,
and the momentous news.
Bless the truthful and pure
Fatimah, the mistress of the women of the worlds.
Bless the two grandsons of mercy,
the Imams of guidance,
Hasan and Husayn,
the masters of the youth of Paradise.
Bless the Imams of the Muslims:
Ali ibn Husayn,
Muhammad ibn Ali,
Ja'far ibn Muhammad,
Musa ibn Ja'far,
Ali ibn Musa,
Muhammad ibn Ali,
Ali ibn Muhammad,
Hasan ibn Ali,
and the Successor, the Guided, the Mahdi—
Your proofs over Your servants,
Your trustees in Your lands.
Bestow upon them abundant and everlasting blessings.

steps.transliteration: Allāhumma wa ṣalli ʿalā waliyyi amrik
steps.translation: O Allah, bless the Guardian of Your Affair,
the Awaited Upholder of Justice,
the Expected Just Leader.
Surround him with Your closest angels,
strengthen him with the Holy Spirit,
O Lord of all worlds!
O Allah, make him the caller to Your Book,
the establisher of Your religion,
appoint him as Your successor on Earth
as You appointed those before him.

steps.arabic: مَكِّنْ لَهُ دِينَهُ ٱلَّذِي ٱرْتَضَيْتَهُ لَهُ
steps.transliteration: Makkin lahu dīnahu l-ladhī rtaḍaytahu lah
steps.translation: Empower him with the faith You have chosen for him,
replace his fear with security,
so he may worship You without associating partners with You.
O Allah, honor him and honor through him,
grant him victory and triumph through him,
support him with a mighty victory,
open for him an easy conquest,

steps.arabic: وَٱجْعَلْ لَهُ مِنْ لَدُنْكَ سُلْطَاناً نَصِيراً
steps.transliteration: Wa jʿal lahu min ladunka sulṭānan naṣīrā
steps.translation: and grant him authority from You as a helper.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ أَظْهِرْ بِهِ دِينَكَ وَسُنَّةَ نَبِيِّكَ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma aẓhir bihi dīnaka wa sunnata nabiyyik
steps.translation: O Allah, through him, make Your religion and Your Prophet's tradition prevail

steps.arabic: حَتَّىٰ لاَ يَسْتَخْفِيَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ
steps.transliteration: Ḥattā lā yastakhfiya bi-shay'in mina l-ḥaqq
steps.translation: until no truth remains concealed
out of fear of any created being.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَرْغَبُ إِلَيْكَ فِي دَوْلَةٍ كَرِيمَةٍ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma innā narghabu ilayka fī dawlatin karīmah
steps.translation: O Allah, we earnestly seek from You a noble sovereignty
through which You elevate Islam and its people,

steps.transliteration: Wa tudhillu bihā n-nifāqa wa ahlah
steps.translation: humble hypocrisy and its followers,

steps.arabic: وَتَجْعَلُنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلدُّعَاةِ إِلَىٰ طَاعَتِكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa tajʿalunā fīhā mina d-duʿāti ilā ṭāʿatik
steps.translation: and make us among those who call to Your obedience
and lead others to Your path.

steps.transliteration: Wa tarzuqunā bihā karāmata d-dunyā wa l-ākhirah
steps.translation: Grant us through it dignity in this world and the Hereafter.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا عَرَّفْتَنَا مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ فَحَمِّلْنَاهُ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma mā ʿarraftanā mina l-ḥaqqi fa-ḥammilnāh
steps.translation: O Allah, whatever truth You have taught us, enable us to uphold it;
and whatever we fall short of, guide us to attain it.
O Allah, through it, mend our fragmentation,
unite our divisions,
repair our ruptures,
multiply our fewness,
dignify our humiliation,
enrich our needy,
settle our debts,
heal our poverty,
fill our voids,
ease our hardships,
brighten our faces,
free us from captivity,
fulfill our pursuits,
honor Your promises to us,
answer our prayers,
grant our requests,

steps.arabic: وَبَلِّغْنَا بِهِ مِنَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلآخِرَةِ آمَالَنَا
steps.transliteration: Wa ballighnā bihi mina d-dunyā wa l-ākhirati āmālanā
steps.translation: and through it, fulfill our hopes in this life and the next.
Grant us beyond what we desire,
O Best of those beseeched,
O Most Generous of givers!
Through it, heal our hearts,
remove the rage from our chests,

steps.arabic: وَٱهْدِنَا بِهِ لِمَا ٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa hdinā bihi li-ma khtulifa fīhi mina l-ḥaqqi bi-idhnik
steps.translation: guide us by Your permission to the truth amidst disputes.

steps.arabic: إِنَّكَ تَهْدِي مَنْ تَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُسْتَقِيمٍ
steps.transliteration: Innaka tahdī man tashā'u ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
steps.translation: You surely guide whom You will to the straight path.

steps.transliteration: Wa nṣurnā bihi ʿalā ʿaduwwika wa ʿaduwwinā
steps.translation: And grant us victory through it over Your enemies and ours,
O God of Truth, Amen!
O Allah, we complain to You of:

steps.transliteration: Faqda nabiyyinā ṣalawātuka ʿalayhi wa ālih
steps.translation: the loss of our Prophet (may Your blessings be upon him and his family),
the absence of our Guardian,
the multitude of our enemies,
the fewness of our numbers,
the intensity of trials against us,
and the tyranny of time over us.
So bless Muhammad and his family,

steps.arabic: وَأَعِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذٰلِكَ بِفَتْحٍ مِنْكَ تُعَجِّلُهُ
steps.transliteration: Wa aʿinnā ʿalā dhālika bi-fatḥin minka tuʿajjiluh
steps.translation: and aid us against these hardships with a swift victory from You,
a relief that dispels harm,
a triumph that honors us,
a just authority You manifest,
a mercy from You that envelops us,
and well-being from You that clothes us—
by Your mercy, O Most Merciful of the merciful!
